alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 27 at 3:31AM MDT until October 28 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s and lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Boulder, Broomfield, western Suburbs of Denver, and the Denver Metro. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight through 9 AM MDT Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Drain outdoor plumbing systems and unhook hoses from faucets.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
